Updated November     pm





Senior linebacker Blaze Soares has started all  games this
season for the Warrior football team PERIOD He has  solo tackles 
assisted tackles and three interceptions PERIOD The  Castle High
School graduate began playing football at the age of seven with the
Ewa Beach Cardinals PERIOD





The two words printed on Blaze Soares senior shirt symbolizes
everything he loves about football PERIOD

 said Soares
a linebacker on the Warrior football team PERIOD 

Soares football career began at the age of seven PERIOD

 he said PERIOD 

He graduated from Castle High School in  where he twice
earned division Defensive Player of the Year PERIOD He joined the
Warriors in  where he appeared in  games off the bench PERIOD

After two successful seasons with the Warriors Soares was
sidelined in  after tearing a ligament in his left calf on the
second day of training camp PERIOD

 Soares said PERIOD


Last spring Soares began rehabilitation to prepare for his
return to the field PERIOD To prevent further injury he rehabbed twice a
day and worked to strengthen his entire body PERIOD

This season Soares has started all  games amassing  solo
tackles and  assists PERIOD He also has three interceptions including
one against New Mexico State last weekend when he gained 
yards PERIOD


defensive coordinator and linebackers coach Cal Lee said PERIOD 

Throughout his four years Soares has made two trips to the
Sheraton Hawaii Bowl and one trip to the BCS Allstate Sugar Bowl
but he enjoys being with his teammates the most PERIOD

 Soares said PERIOD 

Regardless of the Warriors current  record Soares vows that
the team will not give up and will continue to work for a
postseason bowl game PERIOD

 he said PERIOD 

According to Lee Soares outlook is what has made him such an
influential member of the team PERIOD

 Lee said PERIOD 

Soares is set to graduate at the end of this semester with a
degree in sociology PERIOD Following graduation he plans to take a
vacation and 

 Soares
said PERIOD

Soares also plans to continue his training in anticipation of
Pro Day when he hopes to make an impression on NFL scouts PERIOD

 he said PERIOD 

If making it to the next level doesnt work out Soares plans to
put his sociology degree to use PERIOD

 Soares said PERIOD
